question: Which organisation has been instructed by Home Ministry to use core banking services?
option2: Agricultural and Processed Food Products Export Development Authority (APEDA)
explanation: The Home Ministry has instructed 5,845 Non - Governmental Organisations (NGOs) to open their accounts in banks having core banking facilities and furnish details for real-time access to security agencies in case of any discrepancy. In the latest series of steps taken by the NDA government aimed at checking "errant" NGOs.
